cards.title: Sonic Cannon
body: Any number of Ammo cards may be in play next to this card.

At the start of the Environment turn, the Villain with the highest HP deals the Hero Target with the Highest HP 4 Sonic Damage, increased by 3 for each Ammo card next to this card. Then, destroy each Ammo card next to this card.
cards.flavorText: Greyhat shouted over the {br}booms, “It's supposed to be {br}a sonic weapon! Why is {br}it firing bullets, too?”

cards.title: T-Shirt Cannon
body: Any number of Ammo cards may be in play next to this card.

At the start of the Environment turn, the Villain with the highest HP deals the 2 Hero Targets with the Highest HP 3 Projectile Damage. Each player whose Target took damage this way discards 1 card for each Ammo card next to this card. Then, destroy each Ammo card next to this card.
cards.flavorText: There was a moment's pause as the two {BR}looked at each other. “Okay. I know how those {br}things work, but how the heck did {br}they get the shirts [i]on[/i]?”

cards.title: The Blood Leech
body: Any number of Ammo cards may be in play next to this card.

At the start of the Environment turn, the Villain with the highest HP deals each Hero Target 1 Infernal Damage. That Villain regains 2 HP, increased by 5 HP for each Ammo Card next to this card. Then, destroy each Ammo card next to this card.
cards.flavorText: “Look, I know we're under attack by a {br}crazed cultist firing off something called {br}'The Blood Leech', but I'm just glad it's not {br}literally a giant leech,” Greyhat muttered.

cards.title: Goo Launcher
body: Any number of ammo cards may be in play next to this card.

During the start of a player's turn, they may discard up to 3 cards. If 3 cards are discarded this way, switch this with the Hero Equipment version of this card and that player gains control of it. [i](It has [b]Power[/b]: This hero deals 1 Target 3 Toxic Damage. Increase Damage dealt to that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.)[/i]
cards.flavorText: “Does anybody know what's loaded {BR}in this thing?” The group eyed {BR}each other for a moment, before {BR}they backed away from Inquirer.

cards.title: Goo Launcher
powers: This hero deals 1 Target 2 Toxic Damage. Increase Damage dealt to that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
body: Any number of ammo cards may be in play next to this card.

cards.title: Overengineered Slingshot
body: Any number of ammo cards may be in play next to this card.

During the start of a player's turn, their Hero may deal themselves 4 Fire Damage. If damage was dealt this way, switch this with the Hero Equipment version of this card and that player gains control of it. [i](It has [b]Power[/b]: This hero deals up to 4 Targets 1 Projectile Damage and 1 Fire Damage.)[/i]
cards.flavorText: “This is a slingshot. That's {br}on fire.” “It fires bullets! So, it must {br}be a gun!”, The proprieter {br}responded, smile still wide on his face.

cards.title: Overengineered Slingshot
powers: This hero deals up to 4 Targets 1 Projectile Damage and 1 Fire Damage
body: Any number of ammo cards may be in play next to this card.

cards.title: Glitter Gun
body: Any number of ammo cards may be in play next to this card.

During the start of a player's turn, their Hero may destroy one of their non-character cards. If they do, switch this with the Hero Equipment version of this card and that player gains control of it. [i](It has [b]Power[/b]: This hero deals each non-Hero target 1 Radiant Damage. Reduce Damage dealt by those targets by 1 until the start of your next turn.)[/i]

cards.title: Glitter Gun
powers: This hero deals up to 5 targets 1 Radiant Damage. Reduce Damage dealt by those targets by 1 until the start of your next turn.
body: Any number of ammo cards may be in play next to this card.

cards.title: Hollow Point Cache
body: Play this card next to a Gun card. If there are no Gun cards in play and the Environment Deck is not empty, play the top card of the Environment deck.
Increase the Damage of that card's Power by 2.
After that Power is used, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: The room's eyes all turned {br}towards Expatriette for a {br}moment, watching as a mixture of {br}expressions rose to her face.

cards.title: Concussive Rounds
body: Play this card next to a Gun card. If there are no Gun cards in play and the Environment Deck is not empty, play the top card of the Environment deck.
After a target is dealt damage by that card's power, that target deals itself 2 Irreducible Sonic Damage.
After that Power is used, destroy this card.

cards.title: Locked and Loaded
body: When this card enters play, put the Environment Deck in the Environment Trash.
Then, play the topmost Gun Card in the Environment Trash.
Then, play the topmost Ammo card in the Environment Trash.
Then, shuffle the Environment Trash into the Environment Deck and destroy this card.

cards.title: Larry
body: At the end of the Environment turn, play the top card of the Environment deck.
At the start of the Environment turn, this card regains HP equal to the number of Gun cards in play.
When this card is destroyed, first, if it has 0 or fewer HP, each player draws a card. Otherwise, play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: The man gazed over them {br}with a lazy eye. “Welcome to {br}Larry's Gun Club! Sign up now for {br}our gun-of-the-month program!”

cards.title: Standoff
body: When this card enters play, reveal cards from the Environment deck until a Gun card is revealed, play it, and shuffle the other revealed cards into the Environment Deck.
The Villain with the highest HP and the Hero with the highest HP cannot deal damage to each other.
At the start of the Environment turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: The two figures stared at each {br}other from opposite ends of the {br}hallway, weapons drawn  and at the {br}ready. Neither of them made a move.
